backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining types and state for files, notes, folders, missions, uploads, authorization, and persistent storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two gallery bulk-selection related features with associated files, components, tests, and confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of concise per-file frontend summaries describing component behavior, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/DRAFT_BASELINE_V114.md: Documentation establishing a v114 baseline with verification steps, parity validation, and workflow notes.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up PWA metadata, icons, and service worker registration.
frontend/PAUSE_AFTER_RESTORE.md: Change‑control notice declaring a freeze on modifications after restoring Live v114 until explicit user approval.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest specifying app metadata, icons, and display configuration.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, runtime caching, and network-first navigation handling.
frontend/PWA_INSTALLABILITY_NOTES.md: Checklist and troubleshooting guide for verifying PWA installability and service worker/manifest requirements.
frontend/RESTORE_LIVE_V114_CHECKLIST.md: Checklist confirming full restoration of frontend to Live v114 with validated behavior, components, and configuration.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component wiring providers, intro screen behavior, and the home page.
frontend/src/components/ActorInitErrorSt: UI component displaying actor initialization errors with retry, logout, and expandable technical details.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedGalleryI: SVG-based animated gallery icon with hover effects and target-style graphics.
frontend/src/components/ConnectivityIndi: Empty component file with no implementation yet.
frontend/src/components/DecorativeBottom: Renders a fixed bottom border line used as a decorative UI element.
frontend/src/components/ExternalOpenFall: Dialog shown when a browser blocks opening a file externally, offering retry or download options.
frontend/src/components/FilePreviewDialo: Displays a file preview with actions such as open, download, move, and delete, supporting multiple file types.
frontend/src/components/FileUploadSectio: Handles file uploads, link creation, and note creation with concurrency control and speech-to-text support.
frontend/src/components/FoldersButton.ts: Floating button that opens the folders view, styled with a folder icon.
frontend/src/components/FoldersDialog.ts: Deprecated folder management dialog allowing creation, renaming, deletion, and selection of folders.
frontend/src/components/FoldersFullScree: Full‑screen interface for managing and selecting folders with create, rename, and delete actions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing © 2025 and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/FullScreenViewer: Full‑screen file viewer with navigation, share, delete, folder move, and external open fallback handling.
frontend/src/components/GallerySection.t: Displays files and notes within a folder, supporting selection, long‑press actions, previews, and external opening rules.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, auth menu, and a progress bar.
frontend/src/components/IntroScreen.tsx: Shows a temporary animated splash screen that fades out after 2 seconds and triggers completion.
frontend/src/components/LinkOpenFallback: Dialog shown when a link cannot be opened, offering retry and copy‑to‑clipboard actions.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Button component that initiates Internet Identity login and shows loading state.
frontend/src/components/MissionDetailFul: Full‑screen mission view allowing task management, autosave, and viewing attached files and notes.
frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDia: Dialog for creating missions with title entry and task list editing.
frontend/src/components/MissionsButton.t: Floating button that opens the missions view with animated styling.
frontend/src/components/MissionsFullScre: Full-screen missions list with swipe actions, mission grouping, creation, deletion, and navigation into mission details.
frontend/src/components/MobileOnlyLayout: Wrapper layout that displays children inside a mobile-only container.
frontend/src/components/MoveToMissionDia: Dialog for moving selected files or notes into a mission, showing available missions and handling move operations.
frontend/src/components/NoteViewerDialog: Dialog to view a single note with options to download, share, delete, or send it to a folder or mission.
frontend/src/components/SendToFolderDial: Dialog for moving files or notes into folders or back to the main collection, with performance diagnostics.
Swipeable row component enabling edit and delete actions with gesture handling and animation.
frontend/src/components/UnifiedProgressB: Fixed top bar showing unified upload progress and counts for active file, link, and note uploads.
frontend/src/components/UploadQueueRunne: Restores persisted upload items once the backend actor is ready and resumes their uploads with concurrency control and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeIntroScre: Displays an introductory welcome screen with a target-style illustration and messaging plus a login button.
frontend/src/contexts/ActorContext.tsx: Manages backend actor initialization with retry logic, admin token handling, status tracking, and error classification.
frontend/src/contexts/UploadContext.tsx: Provides state and helpers for starting uploads, tracking progress, completing uploads, and restoring queued items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useHomePrefetch.ts: Prefetches folders, files, missions, and notes once the actor becomes ready to speed up home page loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useIntroOnAppResume.t: Triggers a callback when the app regains focus or visibility, but only after Internet Identity has initialized and the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsCoarsePointer.ts: Detects whether the device uses a coarse pointer (e.g., touch) and updates on pointer type changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionAutosave.ts: Automatically debounces and saves mission title and tasks, handling mission switches, pending saves, and mutation queuing.
frontend/src/hooks/useMissionsQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, retrieving, creating, and updating missions using the backend actor with identity gating.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotesQueries.ts: Implements React Query hooks to fetch, create, and delete notes across folders and missions, with concurrency-limited creation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for files and folders, including fetching, folder creation, and upload-limited file operations.
frontend/src/hooks/useSpeechToText.ts: Custom React hook wrapping the Web Speech API for continuous speech recognition with interim and final transcripts and error handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus extensive light/dark theme CSS variables and mobile layout rules.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and rendering the root app.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main home page managing folder/mission views, data fetching, authentication state, and optional dev smoke tests.
frontend/src/utils/actorInitializationMe: Helpers for classifying actor initialization errors and providing standardized error messages.
frontend/src/utils/externalOpen.ts: Utilities for external navigation, file downloading, note exporting, and Web Share API usage.
frontend/src/utils/fileBytesWorkerSingle: Singleton managing a worker for reading file bytes with concurrency control and request queuing.
frontend/src/utils/fileOpenRules.ts: Defines rules for determining how files open in the app and helper checks for viewer, download, and Office document behavior.
frontend/src/utils/filePreview.ts: Classifies files by MIME type, checks previewability, and provides human-readable type labels.
frontend/src/utils/missionCompletion.ts: Computes mission progress, determines mission completion, and splits missions into completed and incomplete groups.
frontend/src/utils/missionTaskCompare.ts: Provides a BigInt‑safe equality check for comparing arrays of tasks by ID, text, and completion state.
frontend/src/utils/notesTime.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/utils/performanceDiagnostic: Implements an optional performance diagnostics system that logs operation timings and supports async timing helpers.
Manages a persisted upload queue in IndexedDB, storing file bytes, tracking progress, and updating completion status.
frontend/src/utils/reactQueryDiagnostics: Logs React Query mutation phases during development to aid debugging.
frontend/src/utils/smokeTestCoreFlows.ts: Runs development-only smoke tests for core backend flows like creating folders, missions, links, and notes, and formats results.
frontend/src/utils/uploadConcurrency.ts: Provides concurrency limiters, including a cancellable version, for queued async tasks.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters, supporting both query strings and hash routing.
frontend/src/workers/fileBytes.worker.ts: Web worker that reads file bytes off the main thread and returns metadata or an error via postMessage. Transfers the ArrayBuffer for efficient data handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind config extending theme colors, radius, animations, and enabling dark mode with custom plugins. Defines extensive OKLCH-based color variables for UI components.
frontend/V114_BASELINE_FRONTEND_FILES.tx: Lists all frontend files that define the v114 baseline for validation and drift detection.
project_state.json: Project state describing the requirement to add an 'All files' bulk-select option in the Gallery and supporting undo behavior. Contains metadata, existing features, and pending requests.
